article.headline: Texas-Arlington 74, Hardin-Simmons 54
article.story: ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) -- Rog'er Guignard made seven 3-pointers and finished with 23 points to lead Texas-Arlington to a 74-54 victory against Hardin-Simmons on Saturday. The Mavericks (9-2) held the Cowboys to 22 percent shooting while building a 35-20 halftime lead. Although Hardin-Simmons (4-5) heated up in the second half, so did Guignard. He was 5-of-7 on 3-pointers and scored 17 of his points after halftime. Jean Mardochee led Hardin-Simmons with 12 points on 5-of-7 shooting. Marcus Smith, the Cowboys' second-leading scorer, was 1-of-11 from the field and finished with two points. The Mavericks led 7-5 when they went on a 13-2 run for a 20-7 lead with 9:36 remaining in the first half. Leading 45-28 early in the second half, Texas-Arlington held Hardin-Simmons scoreless for more than six minutes during a 13-0 spurt that put them ahead by 30 (58-28) with 10:02 remaining.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
